column4: How do i lock the settings in firefox so that it stays on port 8080 so that no one will go past my internet filtering
How do i lock the settings in firefox so that it stays on port 8080 so that no one will go past my internet filtering
what do you mean by locking the settings?
I don't think you can restrict which port firefox accesses pages at
the syntax URL:port should always work
you can block at the firewall level though
what are you trying to do?
why don't you firewall the rest then?
if you block firefox they will use konqueror
and then opera, and then lynx
so the other accounts don't have shell access?
I have doubts it's possible to do that
I would certainly not rely on it
and build a nice firewall with fwbuilder
